Look up the NDAA act. Obama signing a bill that essentially declares the US a battlezone and anyone can be detained without trial for an indefinite amount of time.

I'm not a big conspiracy guy, but I feel like something's in the air and the shit may hit the fan soon. Not tryin to be all doom and gloom people, but prepare for the unexpected. Buy guns.
